text: Vidkladay prykhid do tykh iz nykh, do koho pobazhayesh, i zatrymay tu z nykh, yaku pobazhayesh. Yakshcho ty pobazhayesh tu, yaku poperednʹo viddalyv, to na tobi ne bude hrikha. Tse krashche dlya toho, shchob ochi kozhnoyi z nykh radily, shchob vony ne vidchuvaly smutku ta buly zadovoleni tym, shcho ty yim daruyesh. Allah znaye te, shcho v yikhnikh sertsyakh. Allah — Znayuchyy ta Spivchutlyvyy
